{{Schematic | caption =

'''Basic Subtraction XOR Gate'''

''3&times;4&times;2 (24 block volume)''<br />''flat, silent''<br />''circuit delay: 1 tick''

The block can be replaced by redstone dust.

| style = display: inline-block; float: none; vertical-align: text-top;

|input+rd-ew|rd-sew|rd-sw|||-
||rd-nse|rs-e|rd-ew|output+rd-ew|-
||rd-nse|rs-e|SB||-
|input+rd-ew|rd-new|rd-nw||

}}
{{Schematic | caption =

'''Repeated Subtraction XOR Gate'''

''4&times;4&times;2 (32 block volume)''<br />''flat, silent''<br />''circuit delay: 2 ticks''

Any of the blocks can be replaced by redstone dust.

| style = display: inline-block; float: none; vertical-align: text-top;

|input+rd-ew|rr-e1|SB|rd-ns|||-
|||rd-se|rs-e|rd-ew|output+rd-ew|-
|||rd-ne|rs-e|SB||-
|input+rd-ew|rr-e1|SB|rd-ns||

}}
{{Schematic | caption =

'''Inverted Subtraction XOR Gate'''

''4&times;4&times;2 (32 block volume)''<br />''flat, silent''<br />''circuit delay: 2 ticks''

The output block can be replaced by redstone dust.

| style = display: inline-block; float: none; vertical-align: text-top;

|input+rd-ew|SB|rt-w!|rd-sw!|||-
|||rd-nse!|rs-e|rd-ew|output+rd-ew|-
|||rd-nse!|rs-e|SB||-
|input+rd-ew|SB|rt-w!|rd-nw!||

}}<noinclude>
